name: switch production, toggle type | switch, toggle type | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/11853/documentation

This dataset represents the production of 1 kg of toggle switches used in ICT equipment. It is based on the assumption that a toggle switch has a typical weight of 29 g.The data represent a current toggle type switch, used in current information and communication technology (ICT). Material data are taken from datasheets of producers of such capacitors and from the literature. Infrastructure and production efforts are based on own assumptions and taken from the Swedish LCI database and have thus, accordingly higher uncertainty.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.];Child dataset exchanges identical to GLO dataset. Created to enable linking to regional markets (e.g. for electricity). Data quality indicators adjusted accordingly.

From reception of metals and plastics at the factory gate.

This dataset includes raw material input and production efforts efforts for the production of toggle type switches.
category: C:Manufacturing/26:Manufacture of computer, electronic and optical products/261:Manufacture of electronic components and boards/2610:Manufacture of electronic components and boards

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data represent a global valuable composition of a toggle type switch.;Child dataset exchanges identical to GLO dataset. Created to enable linking to regional markets (e.g. for electricity). Data quality indicators adjusted accordingly.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: average switch production technology, based on literature and assumptions
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Child dataset exchanges identical to GLO dataset. Created to enable linking to regional markets (e.g. for electricity). Data quality indicators adjusted accordingly.

exchanges.description: Typical toggle switch used in ICT equipment.
